content.description:
Pass the initial test of a rugged and rowdy boulder problem to establish yourself into the thick of the fire. 

  From here ascend through the smoke through a vertical panel of rock with relatively easier terrain.  

  As the wall begins to steepen again, set up on small crimps to prepare for the glory throw to a jug crafted by rock Jesus himself. Recollect yourself and prepare for one more big throw before running it to the chains. 

  Best to hold on tight or whip deep into the ashes below
content.location: First route on fire wall. Trends to the left.

content.description:
Climb through the same initial boulder sequence as  "Smokejumper" and continue straight up the face instead of trending left.  

  Pull some ninja like moves establishing onto the slab section and shake before the small roof. 

  From here pull hard to the big ledge where the redpoint crux awaits. Make it to the rest jug and fire through some steep 5.11 jug terrain to the anchors.
content.location: Same start as "smokejumper" trends straight up.

content.description:
Steep wall of sandstone badassery. 

  Only 2 lines exist here, with room for maybe 2 more. 

  Wall receives shade all day
